text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: Do you mean it? Like… really, really mean it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text: Haha! You bet! Wanna pinky swear on it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: Pinky swear? What's that?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you don't know? Well, you see… we put our little fingers together 
like this…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text:
Then you gotta say, "Cross my heart and hope to die." It's like a 
magic spell to make sure we keep our promise! Got it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: A magic spell… I got it! Okay—one, two, three!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Children
text_block_list.text: Cross my heart and hope to die. Together forever, you and I!
Several years later…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Come on, Dia! Hurry up!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Slow down, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But we'll be tardy if we don't pick up the pace! Seriously, how can it 
be this late already?!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Well, of course we're late! You went into Friendly Neighborhood Kita 
mode, after all.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
First you helped that old lady with her bags, then there was that lost 
kid… And let's not forget how you cheered up that lonely old man.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I-I mean I couldn't just ignore them! But I guess we'd better make a 
run for it…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah—wait, Kita! Look over there!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: What is it?! Is someone in trouble?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
There are stones bouncing all along the river's surface! Do those boys 
have psychic powers?!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Oh, honestly… They're just skipping stones! You know, I think your 
curiosity might be another thing slowing us down here…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, no more distractions! Let's keep moving—we've got people 
to meet!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
…And now, for the benefit of our new students, allow me to reiterate 
the purpose of today's race.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Phew… Looks like we made it just in time! Thank goodness!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Shh! The student council president has already begun her speech.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
What does it mean to run at Tracen Academy? In order to discover 
the answer firsthand, all of you who have yet to debut are invited to 
witness a special event—a welcome race, so to speak.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That said, it is bona fide race featuring a coterie of exceptionally 
gifted runners clad in their racewear. I look forward to hearing your 
thoughts and impressions afterward.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez! Let us take over from here!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ah! That voice…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heh… Well, someone's certainly eager. In that case, come show 
everyone exactly how we chase our dreams.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to keep ya waiting! I'm none other than Tokai Teio—the 
strongest racer ever!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ta-daaa! Like my new racewear? It's like I'm a blazing fire on the 
track! Pretty cool, huh? ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Unbelievable. The president was still talking, you know? How hungry 
for attention can you be?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I could ask you the same thing, McQueen. I bet you'd kill for some 
spotlight too.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: That new racewear of yours is pretty stylish. Sure ya don't wanna flaunt it a little?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Wha… That's none of your concern! And I have no need to show 
off—everyone's eyes will be on me regardless.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's more like it. But I won't lose to you, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Ohh… McQueen is so cool… 
Isn't this great, Kita? Your beloved Teio is right there in front of you!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: O-oh, yeah… Teio's super cool. In fact, she's almost… too cool…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's the fanfare! Kita, the race is starting!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(And so, the race begins. The other Umamusume are all fast, but Teio 
and McQueen are in a league of their own!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Our racers are approaching the final stretch as Mejiro McQueen 
maintains a sizeable lead! What a show of power!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But what's this? Tokai Teio is hot on her heels! Tokai Teio is closing 
the distance! She's just two—no, one length away!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text:
They're neck and neck! Go, Teio! 
They're neck and neck! Go, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Teio and McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (At that moment, I feel a gust of wind.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(Teio's so cool, and her running's as powerful as always. But 
somehow…)

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
(McQueen's so wonderful, and her running's as powerful as always. 
But somehow…)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: (This time… I feel more inspired than ever!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
So this is how they chase their dreams—in a genuine, all-out race. 
What a feeling that must be.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: From this point on, we'll be running just like them…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: At Tracen Academy, the school of our dreams!
Display event logo, transition to concert.
